content: As @Grahame Grieve kindly explained by email, the "Implementation Guide" document that we've been producing doesn't qualify as an IG. Thus, the CGWG will have an "Implementation Guidance" that is part of the FHIR core. @ Bob Milius , we should explain this on today's call.

@Grahame Grieve , do you think you could send an email to the CGWG explaining the difference between an "Implementation Guide" and the "Implementation Guidance" that we'll instead have? I'm not clear myself and I believe it'll be very helpful for everyone at the CGWG to understand the differences. Thank you very much indeed!
Are these examples of what we are striving for? http://www.fhir.org/implementation_guides
just sent the email to the WG
@Grahame Grieve , sorry to bother you again. Did you send the email just to the co-chairs? I don't think I got it yet.
oops. I did, but didn't cc: you
